items.summary: In backend/main.mo, update the bonusResource URL generation logic so that every generated plan includes a valid, working HTTPS URL for the Bonus Resource that begins with 'https://', is reachable in incognito mode, and does not use example.com or any placeholder/invented domain. The URL must be a real, publicly accessible resource (e.g., a Wikipedia article, MDN page, YouTube search results page, freeCodeCamp guide, or similar authoritative public URL) that is relevant to the plan's skillName and skillLevel. The URL must be deterministically selected based on skillName (and optionally skillLevel) from a hardcoded lookup table of verified real URLs â€” one per skill. The bonusResource title must clearly describe the linked resource.

In frontend/src/pages/PlanResults.tsx, ensure the Bonus Resource anchor element has its href attribute bound to the bonusResource.url value from the plan data, includes target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer', and that the href is never empty, undefined, or '#'. If bonusResource.url is missing or empty, hide the Bonus Resource card entirely rather than rendering a broken link.

In frontend/src/components/DownloadPdfButton.tsx, update the Bonus Resource section of the PDF template to render the bonusResource.url as a visible text URL alongside the title, so the PDF output also reflects the valid link.
